attributes.action: Protect Muslim and Jewish burial rights according to Islamic and Jewish Law
attributes.additional_details:
We require assurances that cremation of Muslims and Jewish people will not occur under any circumstances.

I want UK Parliament to protect the right of burial for any Muslims and Jewish people who pass away due to Covid-19 infection. 

I understand Parliament is due to consider an alternative way but as British Muslims and British Jews, any other way other than burial is not allowed & totally unacceptable.
attributes.background:
With the extremely difficult and sensitive situation and the ever increasing death toll in the UK due to Coronavirus. The British Muslim & Jewish community are very concerned about any plans to cremate the bodies of Muslim and Jewish victims of this disease. 

Such actions are against our beliefs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305167
